item.title: Donation based Social Contract
item.description: Introduction This document describes the social contract for the community around a piece of open source software (“the software”). It lays out the moral and ethical rules the community agrees to in order to ensure a long, healthy, sustainable life for the software. It is not a legal agreement, although sections of it reference legal agreements. It is a moral and ethical one - it is the foundation upon which the community is built.
